trans-unit.source: Represents a connection point that is displayed on the outer edges of an activity designer on a workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: 表示會顯示在工作流程設計介面上活動設計工具之外緣的連線點。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] A connection point appears as a small square on the edge of an activity designer surface.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]連接點會顯示為活動設計工具介面的邊緣上的小方形中。

trans-unit.source: It is used as a point where a Connector can originate on the activity designer to connect it with another activity designer.
trans-unit.target: 它當成連接器可以將它與另一個活動設計工具連接於活動設計工具產生的位置的點。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref> class by using the specified <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref>, <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerEdges"></xref> enumeration value, and an integer.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref>使用指定的類別<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref>， <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerEdges"> </xref>列舉值，並為整數。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> to which the connection point belongs.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref>所屬的連接點。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerEdges"></xref> enumeration value that specifies where on the activity designer the connection point is located.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerEdges"> </xref>列舉值，指定活動設計工具上的連線點所在位置。

trans-unit.source: An index location of the current <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 目前的索引位置<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: connectionIndex is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: connectionIndex小於零。

trans-unit.source: -- or -- connectionIndex is greater than or equal to the number of connection points on associatedDesigner.
trans-unit.target: --connectionIndex大於或等於連接點上的數字associatedDesigner。

trans-unit.source: associatedDesigner contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: associatedDesigner包含 null 參考 ( 在 Visual Basic 中)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the activity designer to which the connection point belongs.
trans-unit.target: 取得連線點所屬的活動設計工具。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> to which the connection point belongs.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref>所屬的連接點。

trans-unit.source: Gets the bounding rectangle for the connection point.
trans-unit.target: 取得連線點的週框。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that bounds the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref>包圍<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the designer edge on which the connection point appears.
trans-unit.target: 取得連線點所在的設計工具邊緣。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerEdges"></xref> that specifies the activity designer edge on which the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref> appears.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerEdges"> </xref>上指定的活動設計工具邊緣<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref>隨即出現。

trans-unit.source: Gets the connection index for the current <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前的連線索引<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: An activity designer uses ConnectionIndex to identify a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint> in the read-only <xref:System.Drawing.Point> collection returned by <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.GetConnections%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 活動設計工具使用 ConnectionIndex 來識別的<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint>唯讀<xref:System.Drawing.Point><xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.GetConnections%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.GetConnections%2A>所傳回的集合</xref:System.Drawing.Point></xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint>

trans-unit.source: An integer that represents the connection index for the current <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 整數，表示目前的連線索引<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the current <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref> is equal to the specified object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，指出是否目前<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref>是否等於指定的物件。

trans-unit.source: The object to compare with the current <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 要與目前比較的物件<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: to indicate that the current and obj are equal; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: 表示目前和 obj 相等; 否則 。

trans-unit.source: Returns a hash code for the current <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 傳回目前的雜湊碼<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The hash code generated by the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint.ConnectionIndex*> integer or the designer available through <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint.AssociatedDesigner*>.
trans-unit.target: 所產生的雜湊碼<> *> 整數或可以透過設計工具<> *>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a point that represents the logical location of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref> on the associated <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得表示的邏輯位置的點<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref>上相關聯<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> that represents the logical location of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref> on the associated <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref>表示的邏輯位置<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref>上相關聯<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Performs all tasks required to render the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref> on the activity designer surface.
trans-unit.target: 執行轉譯時所需的所有工作<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref>活動設計工具介面上。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs"></xref> that contains the data
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs"> </xref>包含資料

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to draw a highlighted connection point; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>表示繪製反白顯示的連接點。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
